summary: OIL LIGHT ILLUMINATED WHEN STOPPED, AND WENT OUT WHEN IN MOTION.  THE DEALER SERVICED VEHICLE ,BUT THE PROBLEM REOCCURRED.  THE NEXT DAY  CONSUMER HEARD A "SCREECHING" NOISE WHEN DEPRESSING THE GAS PEDAL,THEN VEHICLE STALLED WITHOUT WARNING.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN BACK TO THE DEALER WHO ADVISED THE CONSUMER THAT TRANSMISSION NEEDED TO BE REPLACED.   *NLM.  *AK
